hadiths.text: It was narrated from Zaid bin Thabit that:a wolf attacked a sheep so they slaughtered it with a Marwah, and the Prophet allowed it to be eaten

chapter.ara-name: باب ذَكَاةِ الَّتِي قَدْ نَيَّبَ فِيهَا السَّبُعُ
chapter.eng-name: Slaughtering That Which Has Been Bitten By A Beast Of Prey
